original_query: SELECT MIN(t.title) AS american_vhs_movie FROM company_type AS ct, info_type AS it, movie_companies AS mc, movie_info AS mi, title AS t WHERE ct.kind = 'production companies' AND mc.note LIKE '%(VHS)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(USA)%' AND mc.note LIKE '%(1994)%' AND mi.info IN ('USA', 'America') AND t.production_year > 2010 AND t.id = mi.movie_id AND t.id = mc.movie_id AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id AND it.id = mi.info_type_id
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM title AS title WHERE title.production_year > 2010
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM movie_info AS movie_info WHERE movie_info.info IN ('America', 'USA')
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM info_type AS info_type
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E2 AS SELECT * FROM E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E4.info_type_id=E2.id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM movie_companies AS movie_companies WHERE movie_companies.note LIKE '%(VHS)%' AND movie_companies.note LIKE '%(USA)%' AND movie_companies.note LIKE '%(1994)%'
CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM company_type AS company_type WHERE company_type.kind = 'production companies'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E1 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E1 WHERE E3.company_type_id=E1.id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E2E3E1 AS SELECT * FROM E4E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E1 WHERE E4E2.movie_id=E3E1.movie_id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E5E4E2E3E1 AS SELECT MIN(title) AS AMERICAN_VHS_MOVIE FROM E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4E2E3E1 WHERE E5.id=E4E2E3E1.movie_id)
